title: Two of a Kind
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Oh, Miachi. Hey there! 𝅘𝅥𝅮 You have that candy......!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Yeah, I bought it yesterday since Rina said it looked interesting.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Awesome! Hold on, I got it too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Wow! You bought it too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yup! Rinari thought it looked good, so I bought it! Let’s go find Rinari and give some to her! 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>How did it end up like this...... Well, I was also thinking of giving the candy to her......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>It’s okay. Let’s both give her candy! 𝅘𝅥𝅮 And we’ll eat it together! I want to eat it with Miachi too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Ugh, I guess I have no choice......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yay! Come on, let’s hurry up and find Rinari! I think she’ll be in the courtyard feeding Hanpen at this time of day!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>OK. Let’s race to the courtyard.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
